contentrichtext.text: <!-- I guess this is the Primary topic? -->'''Carlsbad''' or '''Karlsbad''' is a German placename meaning "Charles's spa", named after [[Charles IV, Holy Roman Emperor]] (1316â€“1378) or after [[Charles III William, Margrave of Baden-Durlach]] (1679 - 1738). '''Carlsbad''' or '''Karlsbad''' may also refer to: * [[Carlsbad, California]], United States * [[Carlsbad, New Mexico]], United States * [[Carlsbad, Texas]], United States * [[Karlovy Vary]], Czech Republic (formerly known by its German name ''Karlsbad'', known as ''Carlsbad'' in English) * [[Karlsbad (Baden)]], Germany == See also == * [[Carlsbad Caverns National Park]] * [[Carlsbad Decrees]] * [[Carlsbad Springs, Ontario]] * [[Carlsbad State Beach]] * [[HC Energie Karlovy Vary]] * [[West Baden Springs Hotel]] {{geodis}} [[Category:German toponyms]]
